titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate in support of B'nai B'rith's cooperation with the Union of the Soviet Socialist Republics.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 2/1/1988--Introduced. Supports the efforts of the B'nai B'rith Board of Governors in establishing a district office in the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics and encourages Soviet cooperation.
